message.content:
I need to identify the total income arising from ordinary activities in this income statement, along with its constituent line items.

Looking at the income statement, "Total Revenue" represents the total income from ordinary activities, with a value of 3397619.40. 

The constituent line item that makes up this total revenue is "Main Business Revenue" which is also 3397619.40.

So the "Main Business Revenue" is the sub-item that comprises the "Total Revenue" value.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '3397619.40', 'sub_items': {'sub_item value': '3397619.40'}}}
```
